leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-ADMET/性质预测与分子优化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 标准化→预测→优化→UQ/解释→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: QSAR/生成工具 + 评测基准

unit.unit_name: 数据标准化/特征与QSAR基础工具

tools.name: flexibletopology
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based molecular representation models library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library providing machine learning models for generating molecular representations, specifically focusing on flexible topology approaches for drug discovery applications.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols using Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Jupyter Notebooks designed to perform molecular docking protocols interactively. It includes functionalities for file format conversion, visualization, and analysis of docking results.

tools.name: autochem
tools.one_line_profile: Library for manipulating molecular descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for the manipulation and management of molecular descriptors, facilitating the preparation of chemical data for machine learning and QSAR modeling.

tools.name: BCL
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated cheminformatics and QSAR modeling toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The Biochemical Library (BCL) is a comprehensive toolkit that integrates traditional small molecule cheminformatics tools with machine learning-based QSAR/QSPR modeling capabilities for computer-aided drug discovery.

tools.name: QSPRpred
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for creating QSAR/QSPR models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool designed to facilitate the creation, training, and evaluation of Quantitative Structure-Property/Activity Relationship (QSPR/QSAR) models for drug discovery.

tools.name: specProc
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing tools for spectroscopy data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing a collection of preprocessing tools specifically designed for the analysis and standardization of spectroscopy data.

tools.name: SMILES Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained molecular fingerprint generator using Transformers
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the SMILES Transformer model, serving as a tool to generate pre-trained molecular fingerprints for low-data drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: u-signal3D
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for 3D molecular organization analysis at cell surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A computational platform that defines shape-invariant representations of spatial scales of molecular organization, enabling machine learning analysis of signaling across diverse cell morphologies.

tools.name: GNPS-Trinity
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for LC-MS feature detection and molecular networking
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive workflow combining LC-MS feature detection, molecular networking, and in silico annotation to enhance compound identification in metabolomics.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit utility scripts
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python scripts utilizing RDKit to perform common cheminformatics tasks, simplifying molecular data processing and analysis.

tools.name: sirms
tools.one_line_profile: Simplex representation of molecular structure calculator
tools.detailed_description: A chemoinformatic tool for calculating simplex descriptors (SiRMS), providing a specific method for molecular structure representation.

tools.name: SMILES-enumeration
tools.one_line_profile: SMILES enumeration tool for QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing SMILES enumeration techniques to augment data for training LSTM recurrent neural networks in QSAR modeling.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: GUI-based RDKit molecule editor
tools.detailed_description: A simple Graphical User Interface (GUI) built with PySide and RDKit for editing molecular structures, facilitating manual data preparation and inspection.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization
tools.detailed_description: A library providing scikit-learn compatible classes for molecular vectorization and featurization using RDKit, enabling seamless integration into ML pipelines.

tools.name: FBMN-STATS
tools.one_line_profile: Statistical analysis workflow for Feature-based Molecular Networks
tools.detailed_description: A workflow and guide for performing statistical analysis on Feature-based Molecular Networks (FBMN) in metabolomics.

tools.name: SMILES-X
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous molecular characterization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the autonomous characterization of molecular compounds from small datasets without requiring explicit descriptor calculation, using SMILES-based deep learning.

tools.name: KerasNeuralFingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Keras implementation of neural molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based library implementing neural graph fingerprints for molecules of arbitrary size, enabling learnable molecular representations.

tools.name: DECL-Gen
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for DNA Encoded Library generation and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for DNA Encoded Libraries (DEL) to support in situ combinatorial library creation and evaluation of NGS results from library enrichments.

tools.name: MFBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Fingerprinting BERT model
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing the inference code, model, and tokenizer for MFBERT, a BERT-based model for generating molecular fingerprints.

tools.name: MD_LAIS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Descriptors from Local Amino Acid Invariants calculator
tools.detailed_description: A Java tool for calculating molecular descriptors based on Local Amino Acid Invariants, useful for protein-related QSAR studies.

tools.name: SELFormer
tools.one_line_profile: SELFIES-based molecular representation learning model
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning framework utilizing SELFIES language models, providing pre-trained models for downstream molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised cheminformatics components
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised components and pipelines for cheminformatics and computational chemistry, designed to facilitate reproducible workflows.

tools.name: chemprop_transfer
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning tools for Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: A Python package extending Chemprop to support transfer learning workflows for molecular property prediction.

tools.name: ADMET-PrInt
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET property prediction and interpretation tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the evaluation, prediction, and interpretation of physicochemical and ADMET properties in the drug design process.

tools.name: FEPOPS
tools.one_line_profile: FEPOPS molecular descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for calculating FEPOPS (Feature Points on a Potential Surface) molecular descriptors, used for molecular similarity and representation.

tools.name: YAQP
tools.one_line_profile: RESTful web service for QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: YAQP (Yet Another Qsar Project) is a Java-based RESTful web service platform for training machine learning models and obtaining toxicological predictions for chemical compounds.

tools.name: MaSIF
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular surface interaction fingerprints tool
tools.detailed_description: A geometric deep learning tool that deciphers patterns in molecular surfaces to generate interaction fingerprints, enabling the study of protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: Automated QSAR Framework
tools.one_line_profile: Automated framework for chemogenomics data curation and QSAR modeling using KNIME
tools.detailed_description: An automated framework designed to facilitate the curation of chemogenomics data and the development of QSAR models for virtual screening, implemented using the open-source KNIME analytics platform.

tools.name: Reaction Data Cleaning
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for cleaning and standardizing chemical reaction data
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed for the cleaning and standardization of chemical reaction data, facilitating the preparation of datasets for downstream cheminformatics and machine learning tasks.

tools.name: MolPROP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular property prediction fusing language and graph representations
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model that fuses molecular language models (SMILES-based) and graph neural network representations to improve molecular property prediction accuracy.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Interface bridging Psi4 quantum chemistry and RDKit cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a seamless interface between Psi4 (quantum chemistry) and RDKit (cheminformatics), enabling hybrid workflows and easy calculation of quantum mechanical descriptors for molecules.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for graph neural networks in chemistry and materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end differentiable models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: KERMT
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained graph neural network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained graph neural network model designed for molecular property prediction, leveraging large-scale chemical data to provide high-quality molecular embeddings.

tools.name: cuik-molmaker
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance molecular featurization tool for deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A specialized C++ package designed for efficient molecular featurization, converting chemical structures into formats optimized for deep learning models, particularly graph neural networks.

tools.name: GenMol
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI model for creating novel molecules
tools.detailed_description: A generative AI model that utilizes masked discrete diffusion and fragment-based generation to create valid novel molecules, encoded in the SAFE molecular representation.

tools.name: BuildAMol
tools.one_line_profile: Fragment-based molecular assembly toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for fragment-based molecular assembly, allowing users to construct complex molecules from smaller chemical fragments programmatically.

tools.name: pQSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Massively multitask stacked model for biological activity prediction
tools.detailed_description: A massively multitask stacked machine learning model designed to predict the activity of compounds across thousands of biological assays simultaneously.

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing PDB Chemical Component Dictionary data
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools utilizing RDKit to parse, process, and analyze small molecule definitions from the wwPDB Chemical Component Dictionary.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Free-Wilson SAR analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Free-Wilson Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis method using RDKit, allowing for the decomposition of biological activity into substituent contributions.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alerts and PAINS filtering script
tools.detailed_description: A command-line script and library for filtering molecular datasets based on structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo, BMS) using RDKit and ChEMBL data.

tools.name: ESOL Solubility
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Delaney's ESOL solubility prediction method
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ESOL (Estimated SOLubility) method by Delaney, utilizing RDKit to calculate molecular descriptors and predict aqueous solubility.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of helper functions for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library of reusable utility functions and scripts for common cheminformatics tasks using RDKit, including visualization, clustering, and property calculation.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated physical property calculation for polymers
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to automate the calculation of physical properties for polymers using molecular dynamics simulations and other computational methods.

tools.name: DeepDelta
tools.one_line_profile: Pairwise deep learning for molecular property difference prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool based on Chemprop that processes pairs of molecules to predict the difference in their properties (delta learning), useful for activity cliff analysis and optimization.

tools.name: ROBUST
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics descriptor calculation tool
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools to calculate molecular descriptors from molecular dynamics simulations, specifically applied to predicting drug resistance.

tools.name: CIDER
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical Dataset Comparator for analyzing and comparing structure datasets
tools.detailed_description: ChemIcal DatasEt comparatoR (CIDER) is a Python package and workflow for comparing chemical structure datasets in terms of size, overlap, descriptor distributions, and chemical space clustering.

tools.name: Cheminformatics Microservice
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices for cheminformatics functionality via API
tools.detailed_description: A collection of essential microservices designed to provide cheminformatics capabilities (e.g., format conversion, descriptor calculation) via API calls.

tools.name: TUCAN
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular identifier and descriptor system
tools.detailed_description: Software for generating TUCAN strings, a canonical molecular identifier and descriptor designed to cover all domains of chemistry.

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating and analyzing molecular scaffold networks
tools.detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library built using RDKit and NetworkX for the generation, analysis, and visualization of scaffold networks and scaffold trees.

tools.name: AIMSim
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for molecular similarity and diversity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for analyzing molecular similarity and diversity within chemical datasets. It provides tools for fingerprint generation, similarity metric calculation, and visualization of chemical space.

tools.name: GeminiMol
tools.one_line_profile: Conformational space-aware molecular representation learning tool
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning framework that incorporates conformational space profiles. It is designed for drug discovery tasks such as virtual screening, target identification, and QSAR modeling.

tools.name: Ouroboros
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for directed chemical evolution
tools.detailed_description: A foundational model implementation for directed chemical evolution via navigating molecular encoding space, bridging representation learning and generative AI for drug discovery.

tools.name: Seq2seq Fingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised deep molecular embedding tool
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a sequence-to-sequence based fingerprinting method for generating unsupervised deep molecular embeddings, useful for downstream drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: DrugEx
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective optimization toolkit for de novo drug design
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit for de novo drug design that employs Pareto-based multi-objective optimization to generate molecules satisfying multiple constraints (polypharmacology).

tools.name: HM-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Motif Graph Neural Networks for molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of HM-GNN, a method for molecular representation learning that leverages heterogeneous motif graphs to capture multi-scale molecular information.

tools.name: chemprop (aamini fork)
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty quantification and accelerated optimization for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A variant of the Chemprop library focusing on fast and scalable uncertainty quantification for neural molecular property prediction and guided virtual screening.

tools.name: Web Molecular Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics functionality library for TypeScript
tools.detailed_description: A TypeScript library providing cheminformatics functionalities for web-based applications, enabling molecular processing and visualization in the browser.

tools.name: molecular-vae
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous representation of molecules for automatic chemical design
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Variational Autoencoder (VAE) for converting discrete molecular representations into a continuous space for optimization and design.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithm for drug-oriented chemical space optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that uses genetic algorithms to optimize molecules within chemical space, specifically tailored for drug discovery applications.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit utilities for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and helper functions to enhance the usage of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks, facilitating interactive data analysis and visualization.

tools.name: MCGLPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric representation learning for protein-protein interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework integrating molecular coarse-grained models into geometric representation learning for predicting properties of protein-protein complexes.

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible RDKit wrapper for molecular processing pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed by BASF that wraps RDKit functionality into scikit-learn estimators, enabling the construction of automated machine learning pipelines for molecular data.

tools.name: Neuraldecipher
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for reverse-engineering ECFP fingerprints to molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a method to reverse-engineer Extended-Connectivity Fingerprints (ECFPs) back to their corresponding molecular structures, useful for interpretability and generative tasks.

tools.name: Transformer-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-CNN architecture for QSAR/QSPR modeling
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model combining Transformer and CNN architectures specifically designed for Quantitative Structure-Activity/Property Relationship (QSAR/QSPR) modeling.

tools.name: MolRep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning library for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for deep molecular representation learning, providing various models and benchmarks for molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Descriptastorus
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular descriptor computation and storage library
tools.detailed_description: A library for efficient computation, caching, and storage of molecular descriptors, widely used in conjunction with machine learning models like Chemprop.

tools.name: ChemometricsTools.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemometrics and machine learning tools for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and algorithms for performing chemometrics analysis and machine learning tasks within the Julia programming environment.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecule viewer for dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interactive grid viewer for 2D molecular structures, integrating seamlessly with pandas DataFrames and Jupyter Notebooks.

tools.name: GraphMVP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view pre-training for molecular graph representation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for pre-training molecular graph representations by leveraging 3D geometric information, improving performance on downstream molecular property prediction tasks.

tools.name: Chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for cheminformatics applications
tools.detailed_description: A Docker-based platform designed to facilitate the development and deployment of chemoinformatics-centric web applications and microservices.

tools.name: ChEMBL Structure Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization pipeline for ChEMBL chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: The official protocol used by ChEMBL for standardizing and processing chemical structures, including salt stripping and normalization.

tools.name: ChEMBL Beaker
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit functionality exposed as a web service
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight web server wrapper around RDKit, allowing access to cheminformatics functionalities via a RESTful API.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses, facilitating analysis of binding modes.

tools.name: Chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A standard library for training Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, widely used for its performance and ease of use in QSAR tasks.

tools.name: Cinfony
tools.one_line_profile: Common API interface for multiple cheminformatics toolkits
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface to access functionalities from various cheminformatics toolkits (like Open Babel, RDKit, CDK), simplifying cross-toolkit development.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware reaction template handling wrapper for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling functionality designed to improve the handling of stereochemistry and template extraction in chemical reactions.

tools.name: molsetrep
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular set representation learning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for molecular set representation learning, enabling the encoding of molecules as sets of substructures or atoms for machine learning tasks.

tools.name: datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a lightweight and intuitive wrapper around RDKit, simplifying common molecular processing tasks such as loading, saving, and manipulating molecules.

tools.name: Graphium
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Graph Neural Networks for molecules
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for training and scaling Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) specifically for molecular data and drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: molfeat
tools.one_line_profile: Hub for molecular featurizers
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for generating molecular features, offering a unified interface for various featurization methods including fingerprints, descriptors, and pre-trained embeddings.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for life sciences
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning library for the life sciences, providing tools for drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology, including molecular featurization and model building.

tools.name: DeepChem GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based GUI for DeepChem
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for DeepChem, allowing users to interact with DeepChem's functionalities for molecular modeling and prediction through a web browser.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package for generating many-body potential energy representations and performing molecular dynamics simulations with ab initio accuracy.

tools.name: qsar-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to assist in modeling quantitative structure-activity relationships (QSAR) from 2D chemical data.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics scripts using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility scripts for cheminformatics tasks leveraging the RDKit library, useful for data processing and analysis.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule visualization with Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for drawing and visualizing chemical molecules using the Plotly library, enabling interactive molecular visualizations.

tools.name: padelpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for PaDEL-Descriptor
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the PaDEL-Descriptor software, allowing users to calculate molecular descriptors and fingerprints directly from Python.

tools.name: Bacting
tools.one_line_profile: Chemo- and bioinformatics platform
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform and toolkit for chemo- and bioinformatics, based on Bioclipse, providing scriptable solutions for handling life sciences data.

tools.name: Cheminformatics Benchmark Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking toolkit for cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for benchmarking cheminformatics methods and tools, facilitating comparative studies and validation.

tools.name: RDKitMinimalLib.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for RDKitMinimalLib
tools.detailed_description: A Julia language wrapper for the RDKitMinimalLib, enabling RDKit functionality within the Julia programming environment.

tools.name: Imago
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical structure image recognition toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for recognizing and converting 2D chemical structure images into machine-readable formats (OCR for chemistry).

tools.name: Indigo
tools.one_line_profile: Universal cheminformatics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics toolkit providing libraries and utilities for molecule manipulation, reaction processing, and database search.

tools.name: lazy-qsar
tools.one_line_profile: Library for fast QSAR modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the rapid building and deployment of QSAR models for drug discovery.

tools.name: PyBioMed
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for molecular descriptors
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating various molecular descriptors and fingerprints, useful for QSAR modeling and bioinformatics analysis.

tools.name: Indigo (Legacy)
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics toolkit (Legacy Repo)
tools.detailed_description: The original repository for the Indigo cheminformatics toolkit, providing tools for chemical structure manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: MiniMol
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained molecular fingerprinting model
tools.detailed_description: A compact, pre-trained deep learning model for generating molecular fingerprints, trained on a large set of biological and quantum tasks.

tools.name: whales_descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: WHALES molecular descriptors calculator
tools.detailed_description: Python code for calculating Weighted Holistic Atom Localization and Entity Shape (WHALES) molecular descriptors, used for shape-based molecular analysis.

tools.name: DeepEI
tools.one_line_profile: Mass spectrum to fingerprint predictor
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network tool for predicting molecular fingerprints directly from electron-ionization mass spectra.

tools.name: espsim
tools.one_line_profile: Shape and ESP similarity scoring
tools.detailed_description: A tool for calculating shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP) similarity between molecules using RDKit, useful for virtual screening and bioisosterism studies.

tools.name: FG-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised molecular representation learning method based on functional groups
tools.detailed_description: A BERT-based model for molecular representation learning that leverages functional groups to generate informative molecular embeddings for downstream tasks.

tools.name: HiGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Informative Graph Neural Network for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model equipped with feature-wise attention for predicting molecular properties, capturing hierarchical information in molecular graphs.

tools.name: ChemDes
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated platform for molecular descriptor and fingerprint computation
tools.detailed_description: A platform (and associated code) for computing various molecular descriptors and fingerprints, supporting multiple third-party tools and providing a unified interface.

tools.name: pyg_chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch Geometric implementation of ChemProp
tools.detailed_description: A concise reimplementation of the ChemProp message passing neural network for molecular property prediction using PyTorch Geometric.

tools.name: pyADA
tools.one_line_profile: Applicability Domain assessment for molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics package to perform Applicability Domain analysis of molecular fingerprints based on similarity calculations, useful for QSAR model validation.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: Converts XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecular objects
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert XYZ files (atomic coordinates) into RDKit molecule objects with connectivity and bond order inference.

tools.name: CDDD
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous and Data-Driven Molecular Descriptors
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a model to generate continuous and data-driven molecular descriptors by translating between equivalent chemical representations.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for automated QM tasks including conformer generation, input file creation, and descriptor generation using RDKit, CREST, and xTB.

tools.name: e3fp
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A python library for generating 3D molecular fingerprints (E3FP) from molecular conformers, useful for shape-based similarity and virtual screening.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning Toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction and Property Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning toolkit for drug-target interaction (DTI) prediction, drug property prediction, and other bioinformatics tasks.

tools.name: OPERA
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source QSAR models prediction application
tools.detailed_description: A standalone application providing QSAR model predictions, applicability domain assessment, and accuracy estimates for physicochemical and toxicological endpoints.

tools.name: Scopy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for negative design and HTS/VS database filtering
tools.detailed_description: An integrated python library for screening and filtering chemical databases based on desirable properties (negative design) for High-Throughput Screening.

tools.name: PolyMetriX
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning workflow library for polymer informatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to power machine learning workflows specifically for polymer informatics, handling data processing and modeling.

tools.name: scikit-chem
tools.one_line_profile: High level cheminformatics package built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python package for cheminformatics that provides a more pythonic interface to RDKit functionality and integrates with the scientific python stack.

tools.name: PIDGINv3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein targets for small molecules using random forest models and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular discovery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed with an sklearn-style interface for molecular property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning.

tools.name: eMolFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for molecular fragmentation using the BRICS algorithm, useful for building blocks generation and molecular decomposition.

tools.name: PoseBusters
tools.one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing sanity checks and plausibility validation on generated molecular poses, ensuring chemical and physical validity.

tools.name: GenUI
tools.one_line_profile: Backend framework for molecular generation and QSAR
tools.detailed_description: The backend services for the GenUI framework, providing REST APIs for molecular generation, QSAR modeling, and chemical space visualization.

tools.name: molecularGNN_smiles
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular representation from SMILES
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Graph Neural Networks for learning molecular representations directly from SMILES strings or subgraphs, often used as a baseline or library for molecular GNNs.

tools.name: molecular_rectifier
tools.one_line_profile: Automated correction of unsanitizable RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A utility that attempts to automatically correct and fix molecular structures that fail RDKit sanitization checks, making them usable for downstream tasks.

tools.name: rdkit_to_params
tools.one_line_profile: Convert RDKit molecules to Rosetta params files
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate Rosetta topology (params) files from RDKit molecule objects, facilitating interoperability between cheminformatics and protein modeling tools.

tools.name: keras-molecules
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoder for continuous molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based implementation of a variational autoencoder (VAE) for learning continuous latent representations of molecular structures from SMILES.

tools.name: MolVS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule Validation and Standardization library
tools.detailed_description: A standard Python library for validating, standardizing, and salt stripping of molecular structures, built on top of RDKit.

tools.name: apetokenizer
tools.one_line_profile: Tokenizer for chemical SMILES and SELFIES sequences for Transformer models
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tokenizer library designed to process chemical string representations (SMILES and SELFIES) for use in deep learning models, particularly Transformers.

tools.name: CLAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for enhancing activity prediction in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: Code for the CLAMP method (Contrastive Language-Assisted Molecule Pre-training), which enhances activity prediction models by leveraging natural language descriptions alongside molecular structures.

tools.name: Jchemo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Chemometrics and machine learning toolkit for high-dimensional data in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing tools for chemometrics and machine learning on high-dimensional data, including methods for Partial Least Squares (PLS) regression and discrimination.

tools.name: MolecularGraph.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based molecule modeling toolkit for cheminformatics in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance cheminformatics toolkit written in Julia that models molecules as graphs, supporting structure analysis, drawing, and format parsing.

tools.name: MoSAIC
tools.one_line_profile: Correlation-based feature selection for Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for selecting relevant features from Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations based on correlation analysis, aiding in the interpretation of high-dimensional trajectory data.

tools.name: CDPKit
tools.one_line_profile: The Chemical Data Processing Toolkit for cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolkit for chemical data processing, including tools for pharmacophore modeling, molecular docking, and shape-based alignment.

tools.name: mordred
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A widely used Python library for calculating a large set of 2D and 3D molecular descriptors from chemical structures.

tools.name: Rcpi
tools.one_line_profile: R toolkit for molecular informatics and drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: An R package that integrates bioinformatics and cheminformatics tools for drug discovery, offering functions for protein sequence analysis, molecular descriptor calculation, and interaction prediction.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolkit for drug discovery, providing unified interfaces for various cheminformatics backends (RDKit, OpenBabel) and implementing interaction fingerprints and scoring functions.

tools.name: osmordred
tools.one_line_profile: C++ port of the Mordred molecular descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation of the Mordred molecular descriptor calculator, designed for high-performance calculation of chemical features.

tools.name: PyL3dMD
tools.one_line_profile: Python LAMMPS 3D Molecular Descriptors Package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating 3D molecular descriptors from LAMMPS Molecular Dynamics simulation trajectories.

tools.name: Kekule.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript cheminformatics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for cheminformatics tasks, including chemical structure modeling, rendering, editing, and file format I/O, suitable for web-based scientific applications.

tools.name: DBSTEP
tools.one_line_profile: DFT-based Steric Parameters tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to extract molecular shape and steric descriptors (such as Sterimol parameters) from 3D molecular structures, often used in computational chemistry and catalysis.

tools.name: chemotools
tools.one_line_profile: Chemometric tools integrated with scikit-learn
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides preprocessing and transformation tools for chemometrics (e.g., spectral data analysis) compatible with the scikit-learn API.

tools.name: PhoreGen
tools.one_line_profile: Pharmacophore-Oriented 3D Molecular Generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for generating 3D molecular structures conditioned on pharmacophore constraints, facilitating feature-customized drug discovery.

tools.name: PyPLIF-HIPPOS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Interaction Fingerprinting Tool for Docking Results
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating protein-ligand interaction fingerprints (PLIF) from molecular docking results (supporting AutoDock Vina and PLANTS), useful for post-docking analysis.

tools.name: chemcore
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics toolkit for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics library written in Rust, providing core data structures and algorithms for handling chemical information.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source cheminformatics and machine learning toolkit
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard open-source toolkit for cheminformatics, providing extensive functionality for molecule manipulation, descriptor calculation, fingerprinting, and chemical database handling.

tools.name: RDKit.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript distribution of RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that exposes RDKit functionality to web browsers and Node.js environments via WebAssembly, enabling client-side cheminformatics.

tools.name: MHFP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular MHFP fingerprints implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the MinHash Fingerprint (MHFP6), a molecular fingerprint designed for scalable and accurate similarity search in large chemical databases.

tools.name: chemicalite
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite extension for storing and querying chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: A custom extension for SQLite that adds support for chemical structure data types (SMILES, MolBlocks) and operations, enabling direct chemical data management within SQLite databases.

tools.name: razi
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics extension for SQLAlchemy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends SQLAlchemy to support chemical data types and operations, facilitating the integration of cheminformatics capabilities into Python-based database applications.

tools.name: rxn-standardization
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical compound standardization using language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool from IBM Research for standardizing chemical compound representations (SMILES) using language models, ensuring consistency in chemical data for downstream machine learning tasks.

tools.name: scikit-fingerprints
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible library for molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library providing a wide range of molecular fingerprints and descriptors, designed to be fully compatible with the scikit-learn ecosystem for easy integration into machine learning pipelines.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and loaders for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing access to MoleculeNet benchmark datasets and MolMapNet datasets, facilitating the evaluation and comparison of molecular machine learning models.

tools.name: bidd-molmap
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional networks with knowledge-based molecular representations
tools.detailed_description: An efficient deep learning framework (MolMapNet) that utilizes knowledge-based molecular representations (MolMap) to transform molecules into feature maps for convolutional neural networks.

tools.name: qed
tools.one_line_profile: Quantitative Estimation of Drug-likeness (QED) descriptor
tools.detailed_description: A standalone implementation of the QED (Quantitative Estimation of Drug-likeness) molecular descriptor, designed to be used in combination with RDKit for assessing the drug-likeness of small molecules.

tools.name: rdkit-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utility functions for the RDKit cheminformatics library
tools.detailed_description: A collection of helper functions and utilities to streamline common tasks when working with the RDKit library, enhancing productivity in cheminformatics workflows.

tools.name: ADMET_XGBoost
tools.one_line_profile: XGBoost-based models for accurate ADMET prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging XGBoost to provide accurate predictions for various ADMET (Absorption, Distribution, Metabolism, Excretion, and Toxicity) properties of drug candidates.

tools.name: atom-in-SMILES
tools.one_line_profile: Tokenizer for SMILES strings treating atoms as tokens
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tokenizer for SMILES strings that treats atoms (and their environments) as fundamental tokens, improving the performance of language models on chemical tasks.

tools.name: chemf
tools.one_line_profile: Purely functional cheminformatics toolkit in Scala
tools.detailed_description: A cheminformatics library written in Scala that adopts a purely functional programming paradigm, offering tools for molecular manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: ORDerly
tools.one_line_profile: Cleaning and extraction tool for Open Reaction Database data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to extract, clean, and standardize chemical reaction data from the Open Reaction Database (ORD), preparing it for machine learning applications.

tools.name: pura
tools.one_line_profile: Fast chemical data cleaning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for quickly cleaning and standardizing chemical data, developed to support workflows involving large-scale chemical datasets.

tools.name: admet_ai
tools.one_line_profile: ADMET prediction platform using Chemprop
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit and web interface for predicting ADMET properties using Chemprop models, providing pre-trained models and easy-to-use prediction scripts.

tools.name: Helium
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight generic cheminformatics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A C++ cheminformatics toolkit designed to be lightweight and generic, providing essential data structures and algorithms for handling chemical graphs.

tools.name: pharmacophore-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Simple pharmacophore model generation from RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that leverages RDKit to generate simple pharmacophore models, aiding in structure-based drug design and virtual screening.

tools.name: molecular-VAE
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous representation of molecules using VAE
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Variational Autoencoder (VAE) for generating continuous representations of molecules, enabling automatic chemical design and optimization.

tools.name: NISTPFAS
tools.one_line_profile: Data hub and tools for NIST PFAS Program
tools.detailed_description: A repository from NIST providing data tools and resources related to Per- and Polyfluoroalkyl Substances (PFAS), supporting environmental and chemical research.

tools.name: molplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization for Plotly
tools.detailed_description: An add-on for Plotly that enables the display of molecular structures on mouseover events in scatter plots, facilitating interactive exploration of chemical space.

tools.name: MoleRec
tools.one_line_profile: Substructure-aware molecular representation for drug recommendation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for combinatorial drug recommendation that utilizes substructure-aware molecular representation learning to predict effective drug combinations.

tools.name: DeepDrugDomain
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A versatile Python toolkit designed for the preprocessing of drug-target data and the training of deep learning models for predicting drug-target interactions and binding affinities.

tools.name: HAMFA
tools.one_line_profile: Hypoxia associated molecular feature analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package or tool for analyzing molecular features associated with hypoxia, likely used for biomarker discovery or mechanism analysis in biomedical research.

tools.name: TrimNet
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning from triplet messages
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of TrimNet, a graph neural network model for learning molecular representations using triplet messages, applicable to various biomedical prediction tasks.
